question: Which among the following regional political parties in India has the Party logo of two leaves?
option2: AIADMK (All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam )
answer: AIADMK (All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam )
explanation: The AIADMK (All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam) is an Indian regional political party in the state of Tamil Nadu and in the union territory of Puducherry which has a symbol of two leaves.
